headline: What HP (HPQ)'s AI PC Pivot and Cost Discipline Means For Shareholders
summary: In recent days, HP has highlighted its push into AI-enhanced laptops and workstations, emphasizing an expanded portfolio aimed at enterprise hardware refresh cycles. What stands out is how HP is pairing this AI hardware focus with tight cost control and ongoing capital returns, reshaping how investors assess its longer-term positioning. We’ll now examine how HP’s renewed emphasis on AI-enabled devices could influence the company’s broader investment narrative and risk-reward...

content.title: What HP (HPQ)'s AI PC Pivot and Cost Discipline Means For Shareholders
content.summary: In recent days, HP has highlighted its push into AI-enhanced laptops and workstations, emphasizing an expanded portfolio aimed at enterprise hardware refresh cycles. What stands out is how HP is pairing this AI hardware focus with tight cost control and ongoing capital returns, reshaping how investors assess its longer-term positioning. We’ll now examine how HP’s renewed emphasis on AI-enabled devices could influence the company’s broader investment narrative and risk-reward...

headline: AI-driven inflation is 2026's most overlooked risk, investors say
summary: Global stock markets, riding high on AI euphoria at the start of 2026 may be disregarding one of the biggest threats that could spoil the party: a surge in inflation driven partly by the tech investment boom.  U.S. stock indexes, where seven tech groups ​contributed half of all market earnings this year, made double-digit gains in 2025 to hit record highs as exuberance about AI and monetary easing also propelled European and ‌Asian equities to record peaks.  Expectations for further rate cuts have buoyed bonds too, handing U.S. Treasury investors the best annual performance for five years as inflation retreated, although it remains above the Federal Reserve's average 2% target.

content.title: AI-driven inflation is 2026's most overlooked risk, investors say

Expectations for further rate cuts have buoyed bonds too, handing U.S. Treasury investors the best annual performance for five years as inflation retreated, although it remains above the Federal Reserve's average 2% target.

headline: Neurable Introduces Neurotechnology-Powered Gaming Wearable Headset With HyperX
summary: LAS VEGAS, January 05, 2026--Today, on the opening day at CES, Neurable announced it’s working with HP Inc.’s HyperX gaming brand to develop an industry-first gaming headset outfitted with neurotechnology. This strategic collaboration demonstrates how AI and neuroscience can work together to help players improve their focus and accuracy by interpreting brain activity in real time.

content.title: Neurable Introduces Neurotechnology-Powered Gaming Wearable Headset With HyperX
content.summary: LAS VEGAS, January 05, 2026--Today, on the opening day at CES, Neurable announced it’s working with HP Inc.’s HyperX gaming brand to develop an industry-first gaming headset outfitted with neurotechnology. This strategic collaboration demonstrates how AI and neuroscience can work together to help players improve their focus and accuracy by interpreting brain activity in real time.
